- Functionality: Different actors and actions — GCSMiddleware notifies Dronology and deactivates associated UAVs vs. GCS closes a specific UAV connection.
- Requirements: Different triggers and scopes (connection loss vs. incorrect registration; deactivate all associated UAVs vs. close one UAV connection).

Therefore they are not related.
